{"step_by_step_thinking": "The patient is on a drug that blocks the androgen receptor, which is used to reduce the action of testosterone. This is a characteristic of anti-androgen drugs. Among the options, Leuprolide is a GnRH analog, Finasteride is a 5-alpha reductase inhibitor, Anastrozole is an aromatase inhibitor. Only Flutamide is an anti-androgen drug that works by blocking the androgen receptor.", "answer_choice": "C. Flutamide"}
